title: NEEDED  5 more T206 front/back HOFers.  Let me know if you can help!
author: Archive

posts.post_title: NEEDED  5 more T206 front/back HOFers.  Let me know if you can help!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: B O'Brien
Hello all,
The T206 backs line is getting close to completion.  I need some help locating a few more cards to finish it off.  Please let me know if you have any interest in selling or know the location of any of the following front and back combos, hopefull graded VG-VGEX.  I think the AB can be switched up too and still work out.

M. Brown- Piedmont 150
Eddie Collins- Cycle 350
Marquard- AB 460
Frank Baker- AB 350 No Frame
Addie Joss- SC 350-460 Fact. 25


Thanks for the help,
Bob
upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com
